Flight Path & INS Data¶

The following are key functions related to obtaining flight path & INS data.

Load Flight Data¶

magnavpy.create_xyz.create_xyz0(mapS: MapS | MapSd | MapS3D | None = None, alt: float = 1000.0, dt: float = 0.1, t: float = 300.0, v: float = 68.0, ll1: Tuple[float, float] = (), ll2: Tuple[float, float] = (), N_waves: int = 1, attempts: int = 10, info: str = 'Simulated data', flight: int = 1, line: int = 1, year: int = 2023, doy: int = 154, mapV: MapV | None = None, cor_sigma: float = 1.0, cor_tau: float = 600.0, cor_var: float = 1.0, cor_drift: float = 0.001, cor_perm_mag: float = 5.0, cor_ind_mag: float = 5.0, cor_eddy_mag: float = 0.5, init_pos_sigma: float = 3.0, init_alt_sigma: float = 0.001, init_vel_sigma: float = 0.01, init_att_sigma: float = np.float64(0.00017453292519943296), VRW_sigma: float = 0.000238, ARW_sigma: float = 5.81e-07, baro_sigma: float = 1.0, ha_sigma: float = 0.001, a_hat_sigma: float = 0.01, acc_sigma: float = 0.000245, gyro_sigma: float = 7.27e-09, fogm_sigma: float = 1.0, baro_tau: float = 3600.0, acc_tau: float = 3600.0, gyro_tau: float = 3600.0, fogm_tau: float = 600.0, save_h5: bool = False, xyz_h5: str = 'xyz_data.h5', silent: bool = False, default_scalar_map_id_override: str | None = None, default_vector_map_id_override: str | None = None) → XYZ0[source]¶

Create basic flight data (XYZ0 struct). Assumes constant altitude (2D flight).

Parameters:

  • mapS (Optional[Union[MapS, MapSd, MapS3D]]) – Scalar map (MapS, MapSd, or MapS3D) or None to load default

  • alt (float, optional) – Altitude (m) for trajectory, defaults to 1000.0

  • dt (float, optional) – Time step (s), defaults to 0.1

  • t (float, optional) – Total time (s), defaults to 300.0

  • v (float, optional) – Velocity (m/s), defaults to 68.0

  • ll1 (Tuple[float, float], optional) – Starting (lat, lon) in radians, defaults to ()

  • ll2 (Tuple[float, float], optional) – Ending (lat, lon) in radians, defaults to ()

  • N_waves (int, optional) – Number of sine waves in trajectory, defaults to 1

  • attempts (int, optional) – Number of attempts to generate valid trajectory, defaults to 10

  • info (str, optional) – Information string, defaults to “Simulated data”

  • flight (int, optional) – Flight number, defaults to 1

  • line (int, optional) – Line number, defaults to 1

  • year (int, optional) – Year, defaults to 2023

  • doy (int, optional) – Day of year, defaults to 154

  • mapV (Optional[MapV], optional) – Vector map (MapV) or None to load default, defaults to None

  • cor_sigma (float, optional) – Standard deviation of correlated noise for magnetometer, defaults to 1.0

  • cor_tau (float, optional) – Time constant of correlated noise for magnetometer (s), defaults to 600.0

  • cor_var (float, optional) – Variance of white noise for magnetometer, defaults to 1.0**2

  • cor_drift (float, optional) – Drift rate for magnetometer (nT/s), defaults to 0.001

  • cor_perm_mag (float, optional) – Permanent magnetism coefficient (nT), defaults to 5.0

  • cor_ind_mag (float, optional) – Induced magnetism coefficient (nT), defaults to 5.0

  • cor_eddy_mag (float, optional) – Eddy current magnetism coefficient (nT), defaults to 0.5

  • init_pos_sigma (float, optional) – Initial position uncertainty (m), defaults to 3.0

  • init_alt_sigma (float, optional) – Initial altitude uncertainty (m), defaults to 0.001

  • init_vel_sigma (float, optional) – Initial velocity uncertainty (m/s), defaults to 0.01

  • init_att_sigma (float, optional) – Initial attitude uncertainty (rad), defaults to np.deg2rad(0.01)

  • VRW_sigma (float, optional) – Velocity random walk (m/s/rtHz), defaults to 0.000238

  • ARW_sigma (float, optional) – Angular random walk (rad/rtHz), defaults to 0.000000581

  • baro_sigma (float, optional) – Barometer noise standard deviation (m), defaults to 1.0

  • ha_sigma (float, optional) – Horizontal accelerometer noise (m/s^2), defaults to 0.001

  • a_hat_sigma (float, optional) – Accelerometer bias noise (m/s^2), defaults to 0.01

  • acc_sigma (float, optional) – Accelerometer noise (m/s^2), defaults to 0.000245

  • gyro_sigma (float, optional) – Gyroscope noise (rad/s), defaults to 0.00000000727

  • fogm_sigma (float, optional) – First-order Gauss-Markov process sigma for magnetometer, defaults to 1.0

  • baro_tau (float, optional) – Barometer time constant (s), defaults to 3600.0

  • acc_tau (float, optional) – Accelerometer time constant (s), defaults to 3600.0

  • gyro_tau (float, optional) – Gyroscope time constant (s), defaults to 3600.0

  • fogm_tau (float, optional) – FOGM time constant for magnetometer (s), defaults to 600.0

  • save_h5 (bool, optional) – Save to HDF5 file, defaults to False

  • xyz_h5 (str, optional) – HDF5 filename, defaults to “xyz_data.h5”

  • silent (bool, optional) – Suppress output, defaults to False

  • default_scalar_map_id_override (Optional[str], optional) – Override for default scalar map ID, defaults to None

  • default_vector_map_id_override (Optional[str], optional) – Override for default vector map ID, defaults to None

Returns:

XYZ0 data structure

Return type:

XYZ0

Built-in flight data¶

Create Flight Data¶

magnavpy.create_xyz.create_xyz0(mapS: MapS | MapSd | MapS3D | None = None, alt: float = 1000.0, dt: float = 0.1, t: float = 300.0, v: float = 68.0, ll1: Tuple[float, float] = (), ll2: Tuple[float, float] = (), N_waves: int = 1, attempts: int = 10, info: str = 'Simulated data', flight: int = 1, line: int = 1, year: int = 2023, doy: int = 154, mapV: MapV | None = None, cor_sigma: float = 1.0, cor_tau: float = 600.0, cor_var: float = 1.0, cor_drift: float = 0.001, cor_perm_mag: float = 5.0, cor_ind_mag: float = 5.0, cor_eddy_mag: float = 0.5, init_pos_sigma: float = 3.0, init_alt_sigma: float = 0.001, init_vel_sigma: float = 0.01, init_att_sigma: float = np.float64(0.00017453292519943296), VRW_sigma: float = 0.000238, ARW_sigma: float = 5.81e-07, baro_sigma: float = 1.0, ha_sigma: float = 0.001, a_hat_sigma: float = 0.01, acc_sigma: float = 0.000245, gyro_sigma: float = 7.27e-09, fogm_sigma: float = 1.0, baro_tau: float = 3600.0, acc_tau: float = 3600.0, gyro_tau: float = 3600.0, fogm_tau: float = 600.0, save_h5: bool = False, xyz_h5: str = 'xyz_data.h5', silent: bool = False, default_scalar_map_id_override: str | None = None, default_vector_map_id_override: str | None = None) → XYZ0[source]¶

Create basic flight data (XYZ0 struct). Assumes constant altitude (2D flight).

Parameters:

  • mapS (Optional[Union[MapS, MapSd, MapS3D]]) – Scalar map (MapS, MapSd, or MapS3D) or None to load default

  • alt (float, optional) – Altitude (m) for trajectory, defaults to 1000.0

  • dt (float, optional) – Time step (s), defaults to 0.1

  • t (float, optional) – Total time (s), defaults to 300.0

  • v (float, optional) – Velocity (m/s), defaults to 68.0

  • ll1 (Tuple[float, float], optional) – Starting (lat, lon) in radians, defaults to ()

  • ll2 (Tuple[float, float], optional) – Ending (lat, lon) in radians, defaults to ()

  • N_waves (int, optional) – Number of sine waves in trajectory, defaults to 1

  • attempts (int, optional) – Number of attempts to generate valid trajectory, defaults to 10

  • info (str, optional) – Information string, defaults to “Simulated data”

  • flight (int, optional) – Flight number, defaults to 1

  • line (int, optional) – Line number, defaults to 1

  • year (int, optional) – Year, defaults to 2023

  • doy (int, optional) – Day of year, defaults to 154

  • mapV (Optional[MapV], optional) – Vector map (MapV) or None to load default, defaults to None

  • cor_sigma (float, optional) – Standard deviation of correlated noise for magnetometer, defaults to 1.0

  • cor_tau (float, optional) – Time constant of correlated noise for magnetometer (s), defaults to 600.0

  • cor_var (float, optional) – Variance of white noise for magnetometer, defaults to 1.0**2

  • cor_drift (float, optional) – Drift rate for magnetometer (nT/s), defaults to 0.001

  • cor_perm_mag (float, optional) – Permanent magnetism coefficient (nT), defaults to 5.0

  • cor_ind_mag (float, optional) – Induced magnetism coefficient (nT), defaults to 5.0

  • cor_eddy_mag (float, optional) – Eddy current magnetism coefficient (nT), defaults to 0.5

  • init_pos_sigma (float, optional) – Initial position uncertainty (m), defaults to 3.0

  • init_alt_sigma (float, optional) – Initial altitude uncertainty (m), defaults to 0.001

  • init_vel_sigma (float, optional) – Initial velocity uncertainty (m/s), defaults to 0.01

  • init_att_sigma (float, optional) – Initial attitude uncertainty (rad), defaults to np.deg2rad(0.01)

  • VRW_sigma (float, optional) – Velocity random walk (m/s/rtHz), defaults to 0.000238

  • ARW_sigma (float, optional) – Angular random walk (rad/rtHz), defaults to 0.000000581

  • baro_sigma (float, optional) – Barometer noise standard deviation (m), defaults to 1.0

  • ha_sigma (float, optional) – Horizontal accelerometer noise (m/s^2), defaults to 0.001

  • a_hat_sigma (float, optional) – Accelerometer bias noise (m/s^2), defaults to 0.01

  • acc_sigma (float, optional) – Accelerometer noise (m/s^2), defaults to 0.000245

  • gyro_sigma (float, optional) – Gyroscope noise (rad/s), defaults to 0.00000000727

  • fogm_sigma (float, optional) – First-order Gauss-Markov process sigma for magnetometer, defaults to 1.0

  • baro_tau (float, optional) – Barometer time constant (s), defaults to 3600.0

  • acc_tau (float, optional) – Accelerometer time constant (s), defaults to 3600.0

  • gyro_tau (float, optional) – Gyroscope time constant (s), defaults to 3600.0

  • fogm_tau (float, optional) – FOGM time constant for magnetometer (s), defaults to 600.0

  • save_h5 (bool, optional) – Save to HDF5 file, defaults to False

  • xyz_h5 (str, optional) – HDF5 filename, defaults to “xyz_data.h5”

  • silent (bool, optional) – Suppress output, defaults to False

  • default_scalar_map_id_override (Optional[str], optional) – Override for default scalar map ID, defaults to None

  • default_vector_map_id_override (Optional[str], optional) – Override for default vector map ID, defaults to None

Returns:

XYZ0 data structure

Return type:

XYZ0
